item.title: 2021-2022 Season Results
item.description: USACFC College Fencing National Championships in Providence, RI, Apr 9-10, 2022 Team Results Full results available on the USACFC website. Team Overall: 🏆 Men's Overall: 3rd Women's Overall: 🏆 Men's Epee🥇 Women's Epee🥇 Men's Foil7th Women's Foil🥇 Men's Saber6th Women's Saber🥈 Individual Results Full results available on Fencing Time Live. Women’s Epee: Amina Troupe, 🥇; Brianna Moglianesi, 🥉 Men’s Foil: Alvin Poon, 🥉 Women’s Foil: Molly Cavanaugh, 6th; Rachel Hendrian, 8th Women’s Saber: Maggie Koberstein, 🥉 Midwest Fencing Conference Championships at University of Michigan, Mar 26-27, 2022 Team Results Full results available on Fencing Time Live.
